English.Char_Desc_45: Project manager with real time tracking
English.Char_Desc_250: d-jon is a complete project management system which implements a real time tracking model, templates, multiproject and other features that will help you to keep control of your project
English.Char_Desc_2000: Multi project: You can manage multiple projects at the same time. Time tracking: Track your time for every task in your project. Idle detection: djon detects when you are away from your computer and let you decide what to do with the recorded time. Working detection: If you started to work but forgot to start the tracking tool djon will inform you about this. You will never forget to track your work again. Manual log entries: You can create your own time logs, useful when you don't have your computer close to you. Gantt View: You can see your tasks in a gantt chart. Templates: You can create templates for your tasks, every time you create a task using that template the subtasks will be automatically created for you, example: Development Cycles includes several task that you should create every time you add a new development cycle to your project. Export: export your projects, tasks and time logs and use them in other applications, reports, etc.
